title: Emergency medicine physician impact in emergency department timeframes
text:
Emergency medicine physician impact in ED timeframes
This section includes interrupted time series and regression discontinuity models assessing the effect of having emergency physicians on critical indicators like length of stay and time-to-doctor.

title: Chilean Health System Analysis
text:
This website presents a selection of applied research projects and analyses Iâ€™ve developed around the Chilean public healthcare system.
My work explores urgent care saturation, hospital capacity planning, and the role of primary and emergency services in improving system performance.



Urgent Clinics impact in healthcare networks
Evaluation of the impact of new primary urgent care centers (SAPU, SAR) on emergency department demand and network efficiency.
Emergency medicine physician impact in emergency department timeframes
Causal analyses (RDD and ITS) on how emergency medicine physicians influence wait times, throughput, and patient outcomes.
Bed estimation
Forecasting hospital bed needs by level of care and health service using adjusted formula-based models and avoidable hospitalizations.

My professional focus combines clinical leadership and applied research. Iâ€™ve worked as a consultant for the World Bank, IDB, PAHO/WHO, and the Chilean Ministry of Health on topics such as hospital efficiency, financing, and system modernization.

Bed Estimation
This section presents models to estimate current and future bed needs per Health Service, incorporating demographic trends and service delivery variables.
